home.title: Fleet Tracking for the Modern Age
home.subtitle: Real-time GPS tracking, device-based identity, and offline-first mobile app. Secure, scalable, and stunningly beautiful.
home.features_tracking_desc: High-precision GPS updates with movement detection and status monitoring.
home.features_no_accounts_desc: Mobile drivers don't need logins. Device-based authentication ensures privacy and ease of use.
home.features_offline_desc: Offline map support means your drivers stay on track even in remote areas without signal.
home.features_analytics_desc: Visual history playback, distance reports, and movement patterns for your entire fleet.
home.features_background_desc: The app tracks even when closed or after a device reboot. Reliability is our priority.
home.features_management_desc: Intuitive web dashboard to manage N devices, update settings, and view live status.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro_text: At FleetTrack, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our fleet tracking platform and mobile application.
privacy.data_collect_text: We collect the following types of information:
privacy.data_location_desc: Real-time GPS coordinates from your mobile device to provide fleet tracking services.
privacy.data_device_desc: Unique identifiers for your mobile device (e.g., Device ID) to manage tracking without personal user accounts.
privacy.data_technical_desc: Information about your device, such as model, operating system, and app version.
privacy.usage_text: Your data is used solely for the following purposes:
privacy.usage_1: Providing real-time tracking services to your fleet manager.
privacy.usage_2: Generating historical route data and analytics.
privacy.usage_3: Improving the performance and reliability of our platform.
privacy.security_text: We implement industry-standard security measures, including encryption and secure communication protocols, to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration.
privacy.rights_text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data at any time. For information on how to delete your data, please see our Data Deletion page.
privacy.updates_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

deletion.title: Data Deletion Request
deletion.subtitle: We respect your right to be forgotten. Follow the instructions below to request the permanent deletion of your tracking data.
deletion.auto_desc: Our system automatically prunes historical data to ensure privacy.
deletion.auto_text: By default, all location data older than 7 days is automatically and permanently deleted from our primary tracking databases. This policy ensures that we only maintain the data necessary for active fleet management.
deletion.manual_desc: Request immediate deletion of all data associated with your device.
deletion.device_id_placeholder: Enter the Device ID found in your app
deletion.device_id_help: This ID is required to locate your data in our system.
